Examples¶

Modules in this folder will highlight the main methods of processing images.

Example1.py¶

Example1.Run(Input, Output, Functions, ParameterArray)¶

Takes a list of functions and a list of parameter lists. Runs through each one in turn for each file in Input and saves results to output.

Example1.addToolsToPath()¶

Adds the pyzota_image_toolbox to path so it can be imported as normal

Test.py¶

Short sript to test that all modules can be imported correctly. Test.py sits at the correct place in the file hierachy such that pyzota_image_toolbox can be imported as a standard package without needing to make changes to the path.
